jd: Hello, Hope you are doing well, Please find the job description below; if you are interested, kindly let me know. Title: Data Architect Duration: Contract Location: Frisco TX, KS, Atlanta, GA (Onsite 3 days) Client: UST Locals Required. Except OPT and H1T, All Work Authorization is Workable While sharing the resume, Please do mention the candidate location and Work Authorization. Job Description : Skill Set Rating Azure Services Azure DataBricks Python Azure Data Factory GitLab Data Modeling Data Analysis Test Automation SQL Snowflake Must Have Skills – Skill 1 – 5 Yrs of Exp – Azure Services , Azure Data Factory, GitLab, Snowflake Skill 2 – 5 Yrs of Exp – Azure DataBricks, Python, SQL Skill 3 – 5Yrs of Exp – Data Modeling, Data Analysis, Test Automation Looking for a Data Architect profiles with Telecom B2B Experience Can lead a team of Data engineers working on an Onshore-Offshore model collaborating with customer SMEs. Job responsibilities -• Design, build and deploy efficient & reliable data pipelines to move and transform data • Optimize existing pipelines and maintenance of all source-related data pipelines • Support on-call shift as needed to support the team • Build and Deploy extensive data quality checks to ensure high quality of data • Build high-performance scalable data warehouses and data products • Partner with leadership, engineers, product managers and data scientists to understand data needs. • Improve existing data movement frameworks and add more features • Extreme focus on automation • Expert level SQL skills • Data Modeling • CI/CD Pipeline and DevOps practices • Agile fundamentals • Prior use of Jira and GitLab Waiting for your response. Please share your available time so I can contact you directly by phone. Best Regards, Dharani K Technical Recruiter VDart Inc Email: dharani.k@vdartinc.com LinkedIn: http://www.linkedin.com/in/dharani-krishnasamy-396116178/ Website: www.vdart.com Join VDart's Preferred Partner Program: https://www.vdart.com/suppliers/
